network

Class Mapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Mapper

  • public class Mapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for converting different game objects to a JSONObject.
    Author:
    Wanja Sajko, Cornelia Sedlmeir-Hofmann, Christoph Hermann, Yize Sun
    See Also:
    JSONObject

    • Constructor Summary
